ACS - Advanced Cloud Simulator - Documentation

ACS is a discrete event based simulator for cloud environments.

See: Description

com.samysadi.acs.virtualization.job.operation.provisioner  

ACS is a discrete event based simulator for cloud environments. It aims to provide full support for the simulation of different Cloud Aspects.

This is the java documentation of ACS. This means that you will find classes, interfaces and methods descriptions in this document.

For a quick usage guide, please have a look at the readme file in acs home page.
